trans-unit.source: The MsmqIntegrationBinding class maps Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) messages to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messages.

This binding can be used to enable [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to send and receive messages to and from existing MSMQ applications that use COM, native C++ APIs or the types defined in the <xref:System.Messaging> namespace.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref>.
This method enables you to instantiate a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> and pass in a security mode.
The security mode supported by the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel
The value is not within the range of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class from the settings of a specified configuration binding element.
This method allows you to place the binding settings in a configuration file but add the actual binding in code.

The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_configurationName" name="configurationName" href=""></xref> attribute that identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_binding" name="binding" href=""></xref> element whose settings are used to initialize the binding.
Returns the binding elements in the basic profile stack.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the stack of binding elements in the basic profile stack.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> encapsulates Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport security settings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
Gets or sets the serialization format to be used to serialize or deserialize the message.
This property returns an enumeration value that specifies how a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] message will be serialized and deserialized.
For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"></xref> object that represents the type of serialization to use.
Gets a value that specifies whether security information should be serialized.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security information should be serialized; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
